subject: Basketball

Women and Girls
lead_paragraph: The W.N.B.A. — the most successful women’s league in American history — continues to fly under the radar even as it prepares for its 16th finals this week.
snippet: The W.N.B.A. — the most successful women’s league in American history — continues to fly under the radar even as it prepares for its 16th finals this week.
